title: Will the new client ever be as smooth as the old one?
body: My PC isn't a piece of rubbish but even with low spec mode this client still lags like crazy. I turn on "close client while in game" but it takes so long to boot up again I don't even bother with the end screen now. The old client was smooth and was just so smooth it didn't need any options to close it in game or anything like that. I know the new client just came out but this really sucks considering how much I play this game

replies.body:
When you turn on that  "close client while in game" option, it will make the stat screen load slower since the client itself needs to restart after being closed. If you want your stat screen to load faster you'll need to turn that option off. 

Low spec mode would help with FPS issues if you're on a lower end machine, but since your rig is pretty good you may not need that turned on at all. If you're having some in-game lag issues, it's probably centered more on an unstable connection to our servers. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in a custom game to see if we can smooth out that lag.
Performance improvements will be implemented in future patches.
